name: Jealous Odin
description:
Anti-City Builder for WOWIE 3.0 Game Jam!

When thinking of city-builder game, usually your task is to craft a fine tuned network of dependencies to make your city sustainable and prosperous. But what happens if we switch roles? Will you be able to destabilize the city enough to make it collapse? Put your thinking cap on and try yourself in this puzzle-anti-strategy game. In Jealous Odin cities must FALL for you to PROGRESS!

Use your divine powers to wreak havoc in medieval settlements, but think twice before you act, because even almighty Allfather has to respect cooldowns :D

If you want to chat, you can catch us on Discord :) Kamila#5200 & Cerberus#2283

Game created in UE4 using blueprints only, no code.

Sounds: Freesound.org

Music: Mjolnir & Prepare for War by Alexander Nakarada (www.serpentsoundstudios.com)
